title: @Meddler the best buff you could give to Darius right now is to fix his bleed bug to do its full dmg
body:
This has been a known issue since his release, he doesn't do the full damage on his bleed or he does it completely inconsistently.

Video to explain it all: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gN-5I4KoYpc&feature=youtu.be


Edit: The reason I have been spamming these types of threads lately is because there is no known way to know that Riot is acknowledging and working on fixing this without them directly talk about a fix coming soon.

replies.body: We'll get a fix for that into the next patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BkWUnHsr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-29T07:52:38.307+0000)
>
> We'll get a fix for that into the next patch.

The fix would just making it so it deals damage every 1 second instead of every 1.25 seconds

While you're at it can you fix the billion bugs still affecting Quinn that have existed since release?

EDIT 1: Primarily her interaction with point-and-click CC and flips. Considering the ludicrous amount of abilities Jarvan's flag-and-drag can more or less avoid (read: completely ignore) this shouldn't be too much to ask.

EDIT 2: And also give her Auto-Attacks an audio effect that isn't reminiscent of a 10 year old attempting to emulate the sound of a machine gun with their mouth.

Sincerely,
{{champion:133}} 
A season 3 Quinn main who lost his sh*t when Lucian was released.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BkWUnHsr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-29T07:52:38.307+0000)
>
> We'll get a fix for that into the next patch.

I tried ignite champion.
Tooltip said it deals 130 HP, but the dmg text shows 129.

And fix the bug that ignores people's flash if they flash/dash during it's animation. If you're going to bug fix atleast do all the bugs I'm pretty sure this is unintentional. If it leaves him too weak you can always buff him somewhere else of the ability itself. I just find it annoying that a lot of power on his E comes from a bug.
Will never happen. It isn't a bug. Either you die from not flashing or you flash when he is coming near. By near I mean there is 1000 range difference.
Can you fix Zeds Shadow Q bug? It's been around for ages and it's very known...
